description: The legislation will allow for restrictions to be imposed without the need to declare a state of emergency.
title: MHKs back move to put Covid-19 measures into law
title_page: MHKs back move to put Covid-19 measures into law - BBC News
maintext: It also allows police to impose bail conditions, which previously could only be done by a court, and for the health department to remove a person from one of its facilities, such as a hospital ward, if more space was needed.
